name: Ancient Mind Demo
description:
Ancient Mind

Explore a region of mystery and danger in Ancient Mind, a modern take on the classic Zelda-like top-down action adventure. Explore dungeons, fight monsters, solve puzzles, and discover the truth about ancient legends.

INTRICATE PATHS

Will you be able to navigate through a series of dungeons with a non-linear structure, full of monsters, traps, and puzzles? Even with a map, you will still need to pay close attention to your surroundings if you want to find your way to the end safe and sound.

CLASSIC TOP-DOWN ACTION

Make your way through the dungeon by fighting monsters in a classic top-down combat. Use tools such as grappling hooks and torches to overcome obstacles and reach new areas.

SECRETS AND PUZZLES

Solve puzzles, find keys, open doors, find hidden objects and discover secrets in these mysterious and gloomy environments. Legends tell many stories about these lands, stories about an uncertain past. Will you find the answers you're looking for?
